elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the Migros job advertisement.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: List the requirements profile (tasks) for the advertised position from the information in the advertisement.
elements.correctAnswer: Colonial/freezer management, customer service, product presentation and planning, ordering, incoming goods inspection, responsibility, tidiness and cleanliness.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: There are particularly important points in the requirements profile, these are the core competencies. Think about whether you fulfill them completely.
elements.correctAnswer: Completed apprenticeship DHF, good knowledge of colonial/freezer, reliability, flexibility, commitment, independent and precise way of working, friendliness, very good spoken and written German skills

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Make it clear in a few sentences that your core profile matches the requirements profile (professional qualifications, educational background, practical experience, personality, work and performance behavior, social skills).

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What does an application dossier contain?
elements.correctAnswer: Letter of application (cover letter), curriculum vitae in tabular form, copies of all references, copies of professional or academic qualifications, copies of diplomas/certificates of further education, references (recommendations)
